about.title: About
about.intro: Hello! I'm Giyosiddin, a developer from Uzbekistan. I mainly work in artificial intelligence (AI) and this field truly interests me. I also have experience in web and mobile development.
about.passion: I always strive to learn new technologies and solve complex problems. My goal is to improve people's lives through technology.
about.current: Currently, I'm working on new projects and improving my knowledge in AI.

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.description: I create projects in artificial intelligence and Machine Learning. I work with NLP, Computer Vision, and Deep Learning technologies.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: I create modern web applications. Full-stack development with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and other technologies.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: I create cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter. Apps that work on both Android and iOS from a single codebase.
